Package org.eclipse.ptp.ems.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEnvManager
    An object which provides access to an environment management system on a remote machine.
    IEnvManagerConfig
    A configuration of an environment management system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EnvManagerConfigString
    Provides methods to persist an environment management configuration to a string.
    EnvManagerProjectProperties
    Provides access to environment management project properties for a synchronized remote project.
    EnvManagerRegistry
    Provides IEnvManager objects, which provide access to remote machines' environment management systems.
